abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes arrest of trio of three Colombians led by Harry Valbuena after wave of pick-pocketing crimes in Manhattan committed by group puts New York City Police Dept's organized theft squad close on their trail.
lead_paragraph: Combining polished coordination with improvisation, the police said, three suspected thieves from Colombia stole from several people in Manhattan in recent months — until they aimed too high.

headline.main: Practicing the Art of Misdirection, With Unsavory Intent
headline.print_headline: Practiced in Deception, Undone by Ambition

snippet: Combining polished coordination with improvisation, the police said, three suspected thieves from Colombia stole from several people in Manhattan in recent months — until they aimed too high.
